New Records: Adolis Garcia set a record for most RBIs in an ALCS with 15
Key Match Events: Adolis Garcia hit a grand slam in Game 6 of the ALCS
Pre-Game Insights: The Rangers were considered underdogs against the defending champion Astros
Post-Match Reflections: Adolis Garcia expressed gratitude for his journey and the support he received
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers' win ended a 10-year championship drought for the team
Others: The article discusses Adolis Garcia's history with the Rangers and his previous struggles in the MLB
